title: 1) Why did you decide to learn Rust? 2) Why are you still devoting your free time to improve Rust knowledge
selftext:
As the header says in that order.  
First, why did you decide to learn? what were the thoughts you had when you said let me learn about Rust?  
Second, after getting familiar with what Rust is and how it works, why are you still spending your free time improving Rust's skills?
